summary: I AM ANOTHER SAAB OWNER WITH THE PROBLEM DESCRIBED COMPLAINT "INVESTIGATION # PE08051."  THIS WAS DISCOVERED DURING OTHER WORK BEING PERFORMED ON THE CAR.  ALONG WITH OTHER NUMEROUS PROBLEMS, THIS MAY EXPLAIN WHY WE HAVE GONE THROUGH MANY SETS OF TIRES AND ALIGNMENT HAS ALWAYS BEEN A PROBLEM.  THE 1ST AND LAST SAAB I WILL EVER OWN. *TR
